javadoc: Defines a node that is in the DragDropTree.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new DragDropNode with the given name.
@param name the name to associate with this node.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new DragDropNode with the given name.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name to associate with this node.

methods.name: getIcon
methods.comment:
Get the appropriate icon for this node's state; called
 by the tree cell renderer.

params.name: expanded
params.comment: true if the node is expanded

params.name: leaf
params.comment: true if the node is a leaf node

methods.name: isDropAllowed
methods.comment: Return true if this node can be a drop target.

params.name: dropNode
params.comment:
node being dragged and dropped;
 could be null if the drag was initiated outside of the tree

params.name: dropAction
params.comment: DnDConstants value for copy or move

methods.javadoc: Get the tool tip for this node.
methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.comment: Get the tool tip for this node.

methods.javadoc:
Get the tree path for this node.
@return TreePath
methods.name: getTreePath
methods.comment: Get the tree path for this node.

methods.javadoc:
Set the name for this node.
@param name the name to set on this node.
methods.name: setName
methods.comment: Set the name for this node.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name to set on this node.

methods.javadoc: Get the name of this node.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name of this node.

name: DragDropNode
comment: Defines a node that is in the DragDropTree.
